USA: First Great Awakening: The First Great Awakening took place.
Taiwan: Qing forces suppress the Dajiaxi (大甲西) aboriginal rebellion.
Sweden: The Civil Code of 1734 establish the same law in the entire nation.
Malta: The Manoel Theatre (then known as the Teatro Pubblico) opens in Valletta with a performance of Scipione Maffei's classic tragedy Merope.
Japan: Kyōhō famine happens due locust infestation in Seto Inland Sea region
